trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element in a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.

The `<federationConfiguration>` element contains the settings that configure the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.

The `<cookieHandler>` element configures the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> object that the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) uses to read and write cookies.
The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.
Gets or sets a custom child configuration element, if one exists.
The custom configuration element.
Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_identityConfigurationName" name="identityConfigurationName" href=""></xref> attribute.

The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref> section to associate with this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element.
Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been configured with non-default values.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has been configured with non-default values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref> attribute.
The `name` attribute sets the name to associate with this `<federationConfiguration>` element.
If the Name property is `null`, the current element is the default federation configuration.
The name of this federation configuration element.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
The `<serviceCertificate>` element provides location and validation settings for the X.509 certificate that is used to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
The `<wsFederation>` element provides configuration for the WS-Federation Configuration Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>).
The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
